thread.title: Bystanders rescue young beachgoer sucked out to sea in Hawaii - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Bystanders rescue young beachgoer sucked out to sea in Hawaii - Yahoo7

author: News On February
title: Bystanders rescue young beachgoer sucked out to sea in Hawaii - Yahoo7
text:
Share Bystanders rescue young beachgoer sucked out to sea in Hawaii - Yahoo7 A young beachgoer is lucky to be alive after he was sucked out to sea by a dangerous Hawaiian rip. Bystanders Rescue Little Boy from Drowning UP NEXT VIDEO Bystanders Rescue Little Boy from Drowning 
Footage shows the young boy frolicking in the shallows of the ocean as his grandfather watched on but what was meant to be a fun holiday swim so nearly ended in disaster. 
As the tide made its way back out to sea, so too did the boy, sending onlookers into an immediate frenzy. 
Half a dozen bystanders rushed to his aid as the boy was sucked out further and slammed under a wave. We might have a problem here. Source: Junkin Media I'm going to need a bit of a hand here guys. Source: Junkin Media Bystanders rushed to the boy's aid as he was sucked under crashing waves. Source: Junkin Media 
The crashing waves sent several of his would-be rescuers under the waves before one man was able to get his hands on the boy moments before another wave threatened to swallow him. 
Those who viewed the raw footage on LiveLeak criticised the family for letting the infant swim in such dangerous waters. 
“Those aren't conditions that you allow a little kid to wade into, they're lucky he's still alive.” 
“Excellent parenting,” another wrote. While his rescuers pulled him from the fast moving tide, his grandfather (far right) had issues of his own. Source: Junkin Media His hero moved the young boy to safety much to the delight of his family. Source: Junkin Media
